name: cmr-push
description: Push granule's metadata to NASA's Common Metadata Repository

scripts.preinstall: npm_config_prefix='../../tmp' npm link ../../lib && npm_config_prefix='../../tmp' npm link ../../lib-gitc
scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/cmrjs && npm install && npm run build

author: Miles Watkins <miles.w.watkins@gmail.com>
